Package oopds.assignment.DC.controllers

Class NgoQueueController

java.lang.Object
oopds.assignment.DC.controllers.NgoQueueController
@CrossOrigin @RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class NgoQueueController extends Object
A Controller is a Class that controls the operations of the web service by creating a REST API. This Controller is responsible for Controlling operations for NgoQueue objects. Operations regarding changing the queue, sorting the priority queue and etc.

    • NgoQueueController

  • Method Details

    • getNgoQueue

      @GetMapping("/NgoQueue") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNgoQueue()
      This is a HTTP Get method to get the information of the NgoQueue from the database.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object storing the NgoQueue, or an error message if it fails.

    • sortAndSaveQueue

      @PostMapping("/NgoQueue/queue") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DataResponse<NgoQueue>> sortAndSaveQueue(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> request)
      This is a POST Request to create or sort an existing queue and save it into the database.
      Parameters:
      request - The request passed into the method containing the queue information.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object containing the new queue information or an error message if failed.

    • updateNgoQueue

      @PatchMapping("/NgoQueue/dequeue") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNgoQueue()
      This is a HTTP Patch Request to update the queue.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object containing the updated values or an error message if failed.
